about_the_game:
In the bustling streets of Shiokmenistan, where the scent of success once lingered, now stands Big Chief, a hoodie-clad enforcer with a score to settle. Fed up with being swindled and left high and dry by his elusive debtors, Big Chief embarks on a quest for justice... and cold hard cash!

Welcome to Owe Money Pay Money (O$P$), a retro-infused brawl-fest like no other! Crafted by a plucky team of fresh-faced developers hailing from the heart of Singapore, this free-wheeling side-scroller is a love letter to pop culture, packed to the brim with puns, innuendos, and an electrifying 8-bit soundtrack that'll have your head bopping as you crack skulls.

But O$P$ isn't just your run-of-the-mill beat 'em up - it's a wild ride through a world teeming with tongue-in-cheek nods to Singaporean culture and 80's nostalgia. With its eye-popping pixel art and toe-tapping chip tunes, players are thrust into a whirlwind of action as they pummel their way through barmy foes and face off against formidable bosses. Plus, with an array of wacky weapons and power-ups at their disposal, you can add a little spice to the mayhem.

So grab your hoodie, dust off your fists, and join Big Chief on a quest for restitution in this offbeat adventure that's sure to leave you grinning from ear to ear. Owe Money Pay Money isn't just a game, it's cathartic!

P/S: O$P$ clinched 'Best Video Game' at the inaugural Asian Academy Creative Awards for its captivating backstory and classic design.
